QuestData.Title: Stocking Stalks
QuestData.Description: My men are malnourished, injured, and exhausted, but they are Horde. Every one will fight to their dying breath. As our new ally, we will stand by you when the time comes, but we would stand stronger with weapons.$B$BI have my men out gathering bamboo stalks to fashion into spears. If you can spare the effort, we could use the extra pair of capable hands.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Horde does not back down from a fight.
QuestData.RewardText: These are excellent! We'll have them crafted into weapons in no time.
